FuncDef: The display igmp control-message counters command displays statistics about IGMP control messages on a specific or all interfaces. The display igmp control-message counters command displays statistics about IGMP control messages on a specific or all interfaces.
CLIs: display igmp control-message counters [ interface { <port-type> <port-num> | <interface-name> } ] message-type { query | report }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about IGMP control messages on a specified interface.
-

Indicates an IGMP control message type.
-
